metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Cashguard| - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Guard_06 ae3168fe-dd18-421b-aa51-4d86d1245871 - (-177; 1; -251)

0.speaker: Cashguard Basher Brammels
0.text: If you've had a smooth experience here today, saer - maybe pass it on upstairs? Bit worried they'll replace us with the Steel Watch, heh.
0.context: NodeContext: Politely soliciting, into nervous chuckle at the end

1.speaker: Cashguard Basher Brammels
1.text: They wouldn't replace us with the Steel Watch. The gold plating alone would beggar even this place.
1.context: NodeContext: False confidence, trying to convince himself
